chats.content: Hello! How can I assist you with your coding task today?

Here's a summary of the Splunk logs for a SOC analyst:

Key findings:
• High network activity with 53539 kernel packets captured
• Significant AF_PACKET polling (698123 total)
• Moderate TCP activity (51834 total packets)
• Low UDP activity (579 total packets)
• High number of active flows (1633 total)

Anomalies:
• High number of TCP RST packets (1085)
• Moderate number of failed TCP connections (284)
• High memcap pressure (7 times max)
• High recycler queue usage (1578 recycled flows)

Recommendations:
• Monitor for potential DoS attacks due to high packet rates
• Investigate reasons for frequent TCP connection failures
• Review system resources under high load
• Analyze traffic patterns to identify potential security threats
Hello! How can I assist you with your coding task today?
